pullRequest.title: Feature/grading instructions/display sgi in assessment view fix
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features
 Server: I added @PreAuthorize and check the course groups for all new REST Calls (security)
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features
 Client: I added authorities to all new routes and check the course groups for displaying navigation elements (links, buttons)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


As multiple tutors asses student's submission, the assessment becomes inconsistent.
Tutors used to insert free text feedback and apply their individual interpretation of the grading instructions. This leads to the feedback being sometimes faulty or incomplete. Therefore, instructors can predefine feedback text that tutors can directly drag and drop. This also saves tutors time as they don't need to type the same feedback over and over again.
Description

The structured grading instructions are displayed at three different Places:
a.) At the exercise dashboard before Tutors participate in the assessment
b.) At the side panel of the exercise dashboard after tutors submit that they read the instructions
c.) beside students' submission in the tutor assessment view
d.) In the exercise details page when you click on view exercise
The instructions could be dragged and dropped to the feedback element.
The instructions div color depends on the score:
< 0 : red
=0 : yellow
else : green
Steps for Testing

make sure that you are signed in as an admin:

Create a file-upload or text exercise with structured grading instructions
Create a student's submission for the exercise you created
Navigate to the tutor dashboard -> the structured grading instructions should be displayed there
Start assessing the submission
Drag and drop an instruction to the feedback area -> the score and feedback text should be applied
Drag and drop an instruction to the general feedback field as well

Screenshots


a.)

b.)

c.)

Drag & Drop to feedback element


Drag & Drop to general feedback field


If an element is missing in the text exercise submission tutors can drop the instruction to the general feedback field but in a separate PR this should be addressed by enabling tutors to create a proper feedback element.
